settings.function.windowControl.descript: Configure target window and taskbar behavior.

settings.function.recording.title: Recording Settings
settings.function.recording.fps.label: Frame Rate
Choose between constant bitrate, quality-based, or manual QP mode.
settings.function.recording.quality.desc: Quality level for VBR mode (0-100, higher is better).
settings.function.recording.qp.label: Quantization Parameter (QP)
settings.function.recording.qp.descripti: Target QP value for Manual QP mode (0-51, lower is better, requires hardware support).
settings.function.recording.codec.label: Codec
settings.function.motionPhoto.title: Motion Photo
settings.function.motionPhoto.enabled.de: Automatically generate Motion Photo with video when taking screenshots.
settings.function.motionPhoto.duration.d: Duration of video in Motion Photo (seconds).
settings.function.motionPhoto.resolution: Short edge resolution for Motion Photo video. 0 = use capture resolution (no scaling).
settings.function.motionPhoto.fps.label: Frame Rate
settings.function.motionPhoto.rateContro: Choose between constant bitrate or quality-based mode.
settings.function.motionPhoto.quality.de: Quality level for VBR mode (0-100, higher is better).
settings.function.replayBuffer.title: Instant Replay
settings.function.replayBuffer.descripti: Configure Instant Replay parameters. Recording settings are inherited from Recording Settings.
Maximum duration for instant replay saves (seconds).
